Text: Here's the message, islam is the biggest threat to western society that exisits. shariah law coming to a country near you soon, by the way i am not jewish. fuck allah

islam rules protect women (which are our nobleness) from harm by any way, wear a good covering clothes, no need to hard work, she might get pregnant and that will affect baby,
if her husband hurt her she have the full right to disengage from him

recalculate your judges after you read quran yourself, don't hear from TV or your mind


ahmad

If you have a Bible on your bookshelf, you might be a Christian.  If you have a Torah on your bookshelf, you might be Jewish.  
If you have a Qu'ran on your bookshelf, you might be a Muslim.

If you have all three, you're probably an atheist.

Don't remember who said that, but I love that line.  Thanks for the up!  It's helping round out my collection.  :)
